title: Ezhamathe Varavu (2012) Malayalam DVDRip x264 AAC 5.1
description:
Ezhamathe Varavu is a 2013 Malayalam drama thriller film written by M. T. Vasudevan Nair and directed by Hariharan. The film stars Vineeth, Indrajith, Bhavana and Kavitha in the lead roles while Mamukkoya and Nandhu play pivotal supporting roles.

Directed by : Hariharan
Produced by : Bhavani
Written by : M. T. Vasudevan Nair
Starring : Vineeth, Indrajith, Bhavana, Mamukoya, Kavitha
Music by : Hariharan
Background score : Deepak Dev
Cinematography : S. Kumar
Editing by : Bavan Sreekumar
Studio : Gayatri Cinema Enterprises
Distributed by : Kas Kalasangam
Release date : September 15, 2013
Country : India
Language : Malayalam
